data.actual_result: It acts like you clicked once
data.expected_result: It shouls came back to the first situation
data.short_description: Toggling on/off a notification settings, double clicking will make it as you clicked 1 time
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel, channel settings , notification settings , mute channel - Remember the initial toggling position (If its toggled on, keep in mind that its toggled on) - Double click it - After we double clicked, It would come the initial position  - It acts like you clicked once
